original_text: God's people accepted the rule of the horn, because they had turned against God. They offered their sacrifices to the horn, instead of to God. The horn stopped people from believing the truth. It was able to do everything that it wanted to do.
korean_text: 그의 악으로 말미암아 백성이 매일 드리는 제사가 넘긴 바 되었고 그것이 또 진리를 땅에 던지며 자의로 행하여 형통하였더라

sentences.original_text: God's people accepted the rule of the horn
because they had turned against God
They offered their sacrifices to the horn
The horn stopped people from believing the truth
sentences.korean_translation: 뿔은 사람들이 진리를 믿지 못하게 막았다

sentences.original_text: It was able to do everything
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 모든 것을 할 수 있었다
